caption:
D I A N E
_______________
So her sister-in-law reached out to me for wedding guests dresses.
We concluded,had our virtual measurements with 3ladies.
We sourced for the Ankara fabric,sent it over for confirmation and we got to work.

Fast forward,the dresses were ready,we sent videos to the ladies 
(Violet wanted a change of sleeves,Diane was pleased with her dress,Jessica was also pleased with her dress)

The dresses were shipped.

Just Virtual measurements, 
NO FITTINGS!!
No BRA WORN!!
No ALTERATIONS DONE!!!

I mean look at Diane,she looked amazing ❤️

Thank you so much for choosing EWASVOGUE!!
(Violet has been posted before now,please check our page to see her dress)
WE SHIP WORLDWIDE
For custom made pieces, please kindly send us a DM or follow the link in our Bio or WhatsApp +2348134385437
